text: The Ministry of Transport () is a government ministry in the Ivory Coast. The Autorité Nationale de l'Aviation Civile (ANAC), the civil aviation agency, is subservient to it."RAPPORT FINAL D’ENQUETE SUR L’INCIDENT GRAVE SURVENU LE 21 AOUT 2011, A L’AEROPORT INTERNATIONAL FELIX HOUPHOUET BOIGNY D’ABIDJAN, EN REPUBLIQUE DE CÔTE D’IVOIRE A L’AIRBUS A330-243 IMMATRICULE OD-MEA ET EXPLOITE PAR MIDDLE EAST AIRLINES." (Archive). Autorité Nationale de l'Aviation Civile. August 2012. Retrieved on March 25, 2015. ==References== Category:Government of Ivory Coast Category:Transport ministries Category:Transport organizations based in Ivory Coast
title: Ministry of Transport (Ivory Coast)
